snippet.title: Longplay Baldur's Gate for Mobile Phones
snippet.description:
What do you play when all you have is a feature phone? (Also known as a “dumb phone” or “Java phone”). Well, the answer is simple: You play one of thousands of original games unique to the platform! Whuh? This one is Baldur's Gate. No, not that Baldur's Gate. I'm playing it on a real Nokia N86, with video capture.

===
BALDUR'S GATE
===

You know Baldur's Gate! It's a classic PC RPG, an adaption of Dungeons & Dragons to the desktop!

Well, this isn't that. This is Baldur's Gate... for phones. Not smartphones; no Android, no iPhone. This is Baldur's Gate for what we now call feature phones. It's the Java Micro Edition (J2ME) port by Sorrent, and it's bound to be a beaut!

Here's some unrelated text about the real Baldur's Gate for SEO reasons:

Baldur's Gate is a fantasy role-playing video game developed by BioWare and published in 1998 by Interplay Entertainment. It is the first game in the Baldur's Gate series and takes place in the Forgotten Realms, a high fantasy campaign setting, using a modified version of the Advanced Dungeons & Dragons (AD&D) 2nd edition rules. It was the first game to use the Infinity Engine for its graphics, with Interplay using the engine for other Forgotten Realms-licensed games, including the Icewind Dale series, as well as other licensed D&D campaign worlds such as Planescape: Torment. The game's story focuses on players controlling a protagonist of their own creation who finds themselves travelling across the Sword Coast alongside a party of companions, to unravel the mystery surrounding a sudden iron crisis affecting the region and attempting to discover the culprits behind it, while uncovering dark secrets about their origins and dealing with attempts on their life.

Let's Play Playlist: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLgOcy5VFQ-WXR69mAp6jcnL79ZYMJNivf

More Yahweasel: http://www.youtube.com/c/Yahweasel

Subscribe: https://goo.gl/Kf9nFf

Follow Yahweasel:
Website: http://www.yahweasel.com/
Twitter: http://twitter.com/yahweasel
Discord: http://www.yahweasel.com/discord
Twitch: http://twitch.tv/yahweasel

More videos:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zNli13DOM7s
